name: Mini Blue Griffon Hatchling
description:
Griffon hatchlings are extremely energetic and precocious.
Combine 1 Red and 2 Blue Mini Griffon Hatchlings with 4 Unidentifed Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Yellow Griffon Hatchling.
Combine 1 Blue and 2 Red Mini Griffon Hatchlings with 4 Unidentifed Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Green Griffon Hatchling.
